short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and extract email addresses from the current page using regex matching. Copy extracted emails with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extremely simple yet a very powerful extension to extract e-mail ids automatically from web pages. 

Find all email addresses on the current page with just single click.

Email Hunter is a powerful email extraction extension for Chrome. This extension automatically parses the current webpage and extracts all valid email ids from email links. You can copy paste individual email ids you need, or copy all of them.

Features:
- Extracts email addresses from current web pages automatically
- Either copy individual email ids you need or copy all email ids
- Extremely fast and lightweight (Only 195KB)


Pricing: 
This extension is completely free to use. Most other email extractor extensions, like voila norbert, Clearbit Connect or FTL (find that lead), are either expensive or atleast very restricted in free functionality. 

Informal Disclaimer : 
This extension is not developed with an intention to spam people with your marketing mails, so use it for your personal stuff only.
